data.actual_result: The character count overlaps partially with the scroll bar.
data.expected_result: The character count is shown in the bottom right corner, next to the scrollbar.
data.short_description: On Firefox, when editing a channel's topic, the character count overlaps with the scroll bar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit a channel you have permissions for. - Input a channel topic that will cause a scroll bar to appear.
